about_the_game:
This DLC extends the sexual scene.
Attacking twice changes the underwear and nude scenes.
Hit three times to get a new sexy illustration.

This DLC contains may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

The topics cover mainstream pornographic themes, female/female, vaginal/oral/ toys, seduction.
